topic.title: 5215.403-3 Requiring data other than certified cost or pricing data.

body.p: (6) Submit a courtesy copy of the quarterly report to DASN(P) by email RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 215.403-3 HCA Determination to Award to Offeror Failing to Comply with Requests for Data Other Than Certified Cost or Pricing Data.” Negative reports are required.
